categories.name: Handcrafted Furniture
categories.description: This category includes small furniture items that are both decorative and functional. These are often made using wood and hand-painted in traditional Indian styles like Rajasthani or Madhubani.

categories.name: Traditional Wooden Toys
categories.description: These are colorful, eco-friendly toys made from wood, showcasing traditional Indian folk art. They double as collectibles or play items for children.

categories.name: Decorative Storage Containers
categories.description: Storage solutions with an artistic touch. These containers are functional yet stylish, ideal for organizing spices, tea, or knick-knacks.

categories.name: Kitchen & Serveware
categories.description: Items used for serving or displaying food and beverages, usually made of wood and decorated with ethnic art.

categories.name: Spiritual & Religious Decor
categories.description: This category includes items used for pooja, temple decor, or spiritual displays. Richly painted and sculpted, they represent deities or mythological scenes.

settings.value: Discover masterpieces created by skilled artisans who carry forward centuries-old traditions. Each piece is a testament to India's rich cultural heritage.
